parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To pursue, hence: I persecute. A prolonged form of a primary verb dio; to pursue; by implication, to persecute.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From en and kataleipo; to leave behind in some place, i.e. let remain over, or to desert.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) mid: I lay, of a foundation, (b) met: I cast down, prostrate. From kata and ballo; to throw down.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From apo and the base of olethros; to destroy fully, literally or figuratively.
